events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return the item and request a refund because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The customer's message has been reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster due to mention of return and refund request.
Case has been assigned to the Refunds team agent for further assistance and resolution.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you would like to return your order. I am here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. The product just doesnâ€™t match the description on your website, so I want to send it back.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned item. Please use the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and the clear instructions. I will return the item today.
We received your returned item and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to confirm that your refund has been received. Please contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.
This case is now closed. Thank you for reaching out to us, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our services in the future.
